# yScale

**Instance Property**

A scaling factor that multiplies the height of a node and its children.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var yScale: CGFloat { get set }
```

```swift
var yScale: CGFloat { get set }
```

## Discussion

The [doc://com.apple.spritekit/documentation/SpriteKit/SKNode/yScale] property scales the height of the node and all of its descendants. The scale value affects how a node’s frame is calculated, its hit test area, how it is drawn, and other similar characteristics. The default value is `1.0`.

## Scaling and Rotating

- **zRotation**: The Euler rotation about the z axis (in radians).
- **setScale(_:)**: Sets the [doc://com.apple.spritekit/documentation/SpriteKit/SKNode/xScale] and [doc://com.apple.spritekit/documentation/SpriteKit/SKNode/yScale] properties of the node.
- **xScale**: A scaling factor that multiplies the width of a node and its children.
